name: chai-assert-x
description: chai plugin to reverse expected and actual in assert syntax
author: Grant Snodgrass <meeber@gametypething.com>

scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run build-legacy
scripts.build-dist: npm run clean-dist && npm run transpile-dist && npm run bundle-dist
scripts.build-legacy: npm run clean-legacy && npm run transpile-legacy && npm run bundle-legacy
scripts.bundle-dist: mkdir dist/bundle/ && browserify -d -s chaiAssertX dist/index.js | exorcist dist/bundle/chai-assert-x.js.map > dist/bundle/chai-assert-x.js
scripts.bundle-legacy: mkdir legacy/bundle/ && browserify -d -s chaiAssertX legacy/index.js | exorcist legacy/bundle/chai-assert-x.js.map > legacy/bundle/chai-assert-x.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-legacy
scripts.postversion: git checkout dev && git merge master && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.preversion: git checkout master && git merge dev && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test: npm run test-src && npm run test-appjs && npm run test-dist && npm run test-legacy
scripts.test-src: BABEL_ENV=default mocha -r babel-core/register -r src/test/bootstrap/ src/test/ && npm run lint
